prefill_custom_text: fondo limpio, colores neutros, props mínimos, estética premium simple. texturas naturales, sombras coherentes, cero look IA, sin artefactos.

auto_product_desc.title_short: Black Ribbed Tank Top with Broken Heart Graphic
auto_product_desc.product_description_long: A black ribbed tank top designed for women, featuring a classic scoop neck and a form-fitting silhouette. The front showcases a prominent red broken heart graphic, accompanied by elegant white script that reads 'No Love Only Style*'. Vertically positioned along the right side of the garment, additional white text clearly displays 'STYLE&CULTURE'.
key_visual_features: white script text 'No Love Only Style*'
